episodes.title: S1:E2 How Did You Find Out | You were in a cult?
episodes.description: Join us each week as we discuss the raw moments where women found outabout betrayal, family secrets, and the truth about themselves.How Did You Find Out is a podcast about the moments that change everything.Hosted by Alba, each episode dives into real stories of infidelity, family dysfunction, and self-discovery — told by the women who lived them. These are the conversations people don’t have out loud: the messy, the honest, and the deeply human. #cult #podcast #betrayal
